summary: Transformational Logistics Architect & IT Automation Specialist leveraging 15+ years of experience to deconstruct and re-engineer complex systems for maximum efficiency, with a rare blend of technical, logistical, and psychological insights.

bullets: Architected and deployed internal automation tools using Python and Selenium, reducing manual administrative time by 40%.
Implemented secure API authentication protocols (JWT/Okta) to protect sensitive data.
Developed 'Apache Genie,' a Python-based CLI tool for automated server deployment and diagnostics.
Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations with a 4.9+ performance rating.
Leveraged local geographic knowledge to optimize routes and solve logistical challenges.
Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments.
Designed and implemented a custom scheduling system, reducing downtime by 30% and improving fleet utilization.

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress), Modesto Junior College, Modesto, CA
Culinary Arts Program, Placer County Adult Education
